EDITORLINKDIALOG.HEADER: Link Description and URL Input Modal
EDITORLINKDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Please enter the link description and URL for the selected text.

LoginDialogContainer.DialogDescription: Please select your preferred login method

MAINPAGE.TITLE: Start Your Look-Alike Comparison
MAINPAGE.DESCRIPTION-1: Update a photo for look-alike comparison and proceed with the comparison.
MAINPAGE.DESCRIPTION-2: You can check who you resemble more.

ADD.PICTURE-FAIL-DESC: Failed to add a new picture.

COMPARE.ERROR-USER-NOT-SELECTED: Please select yourself as a comparison target.
COMPARE.ERROR-MIN-TWO-PLAYERS: Please select at least two comparison targets.
COMPARE.ERROR-FACE-NOT-RECOGNIZED: There is a photo where the face is not recognized.

FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-1: Please add the photos you want to compare.
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-2: You can extract and check only faces from the photos!
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-3: Select yourself as required and classify at least one comparison target.
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-4: You can manually recrop or delete images!
